DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if pre-operative vitamin D supplementation lowers the incidence of post-operative transient or permanent hypoparathyroidism in patients undergoing total thyroidectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Vitamin D for Post-thyroidectomy Hypocalcemia
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing total thyroidecomty +/ CND Adult (age > or = 18) Known chronic kidney disease Known primary hyper or hypoparathyroidism Known hypoalbuminemia Concurrent use medications affecting calcium metabolism Completion hemithyroidectomy
